Birds Open Source

The aim of this project is to help low-budget teams in non-space faring nations by providing a more solid basis for satellite development. We know from experience that starting from scratch is too much work.

Antenna Board

The antenna board carries both the communication antennas as well as the GPS antenna. The comms antenna is a tape antenna, folded in a ring and held in place by a resistor heater and string. At the time of deployment, this antenna springs open and starts to function. The GPS Antenna is a simple ceramic antenna, no release mechanism required.

The documentation for the BIRDS3 version of this board can be found here. The documentation for the BIRDS4 version of this board can be found here. Back
